DOC.brief_summary: This study include 60 patient early breast cancer refer receive adjuvant chemotherapy AC ( adriamycin- cyclophosphamide ) CAF ( adriamycin- cyclophosphamide- 5- fluorouracil ) combination . These patient receive every day one spoon Lifemel honey regular honey ( double blind ) - adjuvant chemotherapy .Every week WBC count perform order record influence Lifemel myelotoxicity .
DOC.brief_title: Lifemel Honey Reduce Leucopenia During Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: breast cancer patient treat adjuvant chemotherapy PS = 2 le
